TopicTitle: How To Land For the First Time (On the Mun)

Articles.Content: Hey Guys! TJ here, this is how to land on the Mun and other planets, For you new Keralnaughts landing is probably a huge challenge, Well I will give you a quick tutorial, Ok we'll be Landing on the Mun first, so step 1 get yourself as circular as an orbit As possible, step 2, rotate your orbit so your apoasis is about 45 degrees ahead of the Mun, then fire until you see your orbit goes purple, and you see an orange section with a sphere near it. step 3 Time warp until the orange orbit turns blue, then see that little circle with the X In it? throttle up, until your rocket's orbit is straight down, get to the top dot on the nav ball, that's vertical. deploy your landing gear and hope for the best. check out my other tutorials on how to get back to kerbin, and go to other planets. Good Luck, And Good Day new recruits!
Also Guys remember If you want me to tell you how to Dock, I won't because I am still getting the hang of it, but later I will tell you how to dock
I think you mean "Kerbonauts." Blame my OCD, but when it comes to KSP....
Did this actually work for you? If you kill your Munar-relative velocity at the edge of the Mun's SOI, you'll impact the surface going about 800 m/s (~1800 mph). "Hope for the best" indeed.
